plugins.author: Kenneth Christensen
plugins.description: Generate HTTP Links to your vault files for universal URL recognition

plugins.name: QuickLink
plugins.author: Jamba Hailar
plugins.description: Quickly create links to files using @ trigger character

plugins.name: URL Formatter
plugins.author: Thomas Snoeck
plugins.description: Automatically formats specific URLs pasted into your notes into clean Markdown links.

plugins.name: Notebook Navigator
plugins.author: Johan Sanneblad
plugins.description: Replace the default file explorer with a clean two-pane interface featuring folder tree, tag browsing, file previews, keyboard navigation, drag-and-drop, pinned notes, and customizable display options.

plugins.name: HOME key
plugins.author: shichishima
plugins.description: Move cursor to beginning of text, considering Markdown heading characters.

plugins.name: Move Cursor On Startup
plugins.author: Jared Kelnhofer
plugins.description: Move cursor right then left briefly on startup --> first opened note. Makes DataView expressions 'activate' automatically instead of waiting for user interaction.

plugins.name: XMind Linker
plugins.author: Leafney
plugins.description: View XMind files in your vault and connect to XMind software for editing.

plugins.name: Maps
plugins.author: Obsidian
plugins.description: Adds a map layout to bases so you can display notes as an interactive map view.

plugins.name: Radial timeline
plugins.author: Eric Rhys Taylor
plugins.description: A radial timeline for creative fiction writing projects that displays scenes organized by act, subplot, and numeric order for a complete view of the project.

plugins.name: Tasks Map
plugins.author: NicoKNL
plugins.description: A visual graph view of your tasks.

plugins.name: Google Calendar Importer
plugins.author: Fan Li
plugins.description: A simple and light-weighted google calendar importer, allow injecting the events / tasks of a day automatically to your daily notes, or import it to anywhere with a command.
